definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 17 century.
First attested in the mid 17 century.

definitions.definition: Up to a certain level or line; equally advanced
examples: to keep abreast of [or with] the present state of science
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 17 century.

definitions.definition: Side by side; also, opposite; over against; on a line with the vessel 's beam.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 17 century.

main_definition: Side by side, facing forward. [First attested from around (1350 to 1470.)]
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Alongside; parallel to. [First attested in the mid 17 century.]
Informed, well-informed, familiar, acquainted. [First attested in the mid 17 century.]
Up to a certain level or line; equally advanced [First attested in the mid 17 century.]
( nautical ) Side by side; also, opposite; over against; on a line with the vessel 's beam. [First attested in the late 17 century.]
